job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the task of integrating AI capabilities into existing or new software systems, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This describes the fundamental software engineering activities of designing, building, and integrating application components across the full stack.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the end-to-end responsibility for the software development lifecycle, a key task in software engineering roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the core task of building and deploying applications that are powered by AI and designed with the user in mind.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the use of specific generative AI models (LLMs) to build functional tools and features, aligning with the application of prompt engineering and generative AI concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the need to understand user needs and align technical solutions with broader goals and standards in the educational technology domain.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes collaboration with stakeholders to align technical solutions with specific user (learner) requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students
job_tasks.justification: This points to the business objective of the role, focusing on delivering measurable impact and efficiency improvements for the target user group.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the responsibility and proactive approach expected from the candidate, encompassing the full product lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: push the boundaries of what's possible
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a drive for innovation and a willingness to explore new possibilities and advancements in the field.

job_tasks.phrase: driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the role's focus on innovation and the development of novel, advanced applications.

job_tasks.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This describes the initiative and ownership required to transform abstract concepts into tangible, finished products.

soft_skills.phrase: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success
continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products

profile.rationale: The job description emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as architecting and coding full-stack web applications (1.A.1) and taking ownership of the entire product lifecycle. While it involves working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude (1.B.2), the primary focus is on integrating these AI capabilities into user-facing applications, rather than developing or fine-tuning the AI models themselves. The role requires a strong foundation in software development, making it an 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, as the output of their work is an AI-powered feature or system.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, explicitly stating the blend of full-stack development and AI integration, and the expected level of ownership and innovation. The distinction between building AI-powered applications and building AI models is implicitly clear.
